element.fileContext:
Production-grade AI and automation

We build intelligent systems that run your operations and turn data into decisions.

RRK Technologies scopes, ships, and maintains automation and data products. Multi-cloud by design: GCP, AWS, and Azure. In parallel, we build StockLight - a clean, actionable market insights product.

Explore automation services Open StockLight

Two tracks. One standard.

RRK is a productized automation agency. StockLight is a focused product. Same quality bar.

RRK Automation

suggestion.reason: Rule-based suggestion from element type and content

element.codeSnippet: Open StockLight
element.fileContext:
Production-grade AI and automation

We build intelligent systems that run your operations and turn data into decisions.

RRK Technologies scopes, ships, and maintains automation and data products. Multi-cloud by design: GCP, AWS, and Azure. In parallel, we build StockLight - a clean, actionable market insights product.

Explore automation services Open StockLight

Two tracks. One standard.

RRK is a productized automation agency. StockLight is a focused product. Same quality bar.

RRK Automation UI and API automation, LLM agents, data pipelines, reliability
element.snippet: Open StockLight

suggestion.reason: Rule-based suggestion from element type and content

element.fileContext:
RRK - Productized automation agency

We deliver automation that replaces hours of manual work and makes outcomes measurable.

  • LLM agents and orchestration across your stack
  • UI and API automation with page-object discipline
  • Cloud-native backends and event pipelines
  • Analytics and BI on Supabase and pgvector
  • Quality gates and health checks for stable releases
See services

StockLight - Financial intelligence product

A product that turns noisy market feeds into clear, conversation-ready insights.

  • Daily market briefs and context-aware analysis
  • Watchlists that highlight what matters for you
  • Foundation for alerts, personalization, and portfolios
